synonyms.synonym: Receptor activator of nuclear factor kappa-B ligand
Tumor necrosis factor ligand superfamily member 11, membrane form
Tumor necrosis factor ligand superfamily member 11, soluble form

protein.general_function: Involved in tumor necrosis factor receptor binding
protein.specific_function: Cytokine that binds to TNFRSF11B/OPG and to TNFRSF11A/RANK. Osteoclast differentiation and activation factor. Augments the ability of dendritic cells to stimulate naive T-cell proliferation. May be an important regulator of interactions between T-cells and dendritic cells and may play a role in the regulation of the T-cell-dependent immune response. May also play an important role in enhanced bone-resorption in humoral hypercalcemia of malignancy

go_class.description: tumor necrosis factor receptor superfamily binding

subcellular_locations.subcellular_location: Tumor necrosis factor ligand superfamily member 11
